# play()

**Instance Method**

Plays the movie.

## Declaration

```swift
func play()
```

## Discussion

If the movie is currently paused, this resumes playback from the current position.

## Controlling Playback

- **pause()**: Pauses the movie.
- **playFromBeginning()**: Plays the movie from the beginning.

items.description: Plays the movie from the beginning.
